textAfterTable: August 21, 2009 (Risk Factor Assessment) Comments: Notes: Do not store clean aprons in restroom. Light shield missing in dough walk-in cooler. Good handwashing and utensil use. Good date labeling. February 23, 2009 (Routine) Violations: 1180 - Food thermometer provided is no longer operating. Obtain a new properly operating food thermometer. 2010 - Observed rolls of paper towels stored in the restroom. Do not store open uncovered paper towel rolls in the restroom. 2920 - Restroom door does not self close and was found open. Keep restroom door closed and provide a self closing device. 3180 - Observed floors, especially along walls and at corners in need of cleaning. Clean physical facilities regularly. Comments: Good handwashing observed. August 28, 2008 (Risk Factor Assessment) Comments: Facility looks great.Note: digital food thermometer no longer working. No bare hand contact observed. Utensils used. Quat at 300 ppm. March 14, 2008 (Routine) Violations: 0220 - Corrected During Inspection Critical Observed some open drinking cups.
